diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,265 @@
+class ApplicationData
+  def initialize(data)
+    @data = data || {}
+  end
+
+  def student0_application_gender_identification
+    @data["student0_application_gender_identification"]
body:
Also a personal habit of mine with no impact on the functionality or visibility: I'd like to define a private `attr_reader` for things that get assigned within the constructor and then spare all the `@`s afterwards.

But as I said, just a personal habit of mine, no need to adapt this here.
body_html:

But as I said, just a personal habit of mine, no need to adapt this here.
body_text:
